sellerCard.oneLiner: Making Clients Reimagine Their Online Presence
sellerCard.description:
Hello there, I’m Abbas, a seasoned website designer and developer. Specializing in crafting captivating online experiences using Figma, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Php, and WordPress.

With over 5 years of expertise, I’ve excelled in various industries, from corporate to creative agencies, ensuring each project shines.

Every website is a unique canvas, and I'm dedicated to delivering tailor-made solutions that exceed expectations.

Let’s collaborate on bringing your vision to life with precision and flair – drop me a line today.

description.content:
Elevate Your Business with the Best Web Development Solutions


Im Abbas, CEO of Devsaffinity, leading an elite team of 20+ designers and developers specializing in creating high-performance, custom websites for businesses ready to scale. With 7+ years of industry experience, we provide end-to-end solutions tailored to your business goals.


Why Partner with Us?

  • Expertise in WordPress, E-commerce, and Custom CMS solutions
  • Proven track record of delivering top-notch, conversion-driven websites
  • A dedicated team for each project, ensuring timely and meticulous execution
  • 100% tailored solutions for businesses looking to stand out


What We Offer:

  • Custom-built, scalable websites designed to drive revenue
  • Fully responsive, modern UI/UX with seamless user experience
  • E-commerce solutions, web apps, landing pages, and more
  • Ongoing support and maintenance post-launch


Our Promise to You:

  • Unlimited Free Revisions!!
  • Fast Response Time and timely delivery on every project
  • 3 Months of Free Bug Support on the work we deliver
  • Transparent Communication and expert advice


We treat your project as our own, ensuring high-quality, custom solutions.


Lets create something amazing together!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide before we get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: First you will have to purchase domain & hosting. Feel free to discuss If you haven't purchased yet, we'll guide. We'll also need your company logo(optional) & name of the pages for website. e.g. Home, About Us, Services, Contact You'll have to provide us content (text, image) for the pages.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you do custom offers?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Please reach out to get a custom offer tailored to your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How many revisions do I get with every order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We provide unlimited revisions within scope of the project. Your 100% satisfaction is our first priority.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What kind of work you do and can I see some work expamples?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I make complete Wordpress and Full Stack websites from scratch. Please Reach out to get work examples relevant to you or see my portfolio at: https://www.fiverr.com/users/devsaffinity/portfolio

reviews.comment:
I’m extremely happy with Abbas and his team. From the start, he was quick to respond, spoke excellent English, and understood exactly what I needed. Throughout the three-month process, he was patient, made every change I requested, and always took the time to ensure everything was perfect.

What stood out most was his availability—whenever I needed a call, he was there, ready to help and explain things clearly. He never rushed the project and focused on delivering a high-quality website that met all my expectations. The end result is exactly what I wanted, and I’d highly recommend Abbas to anyone looking for a reliable and skilled web developer!

Thrilled with the results! The website looks fantastic clean, modern, and just what we needed. The team was professional and responsive, making sure every aspect was tailored to our specifications. A great partner for anyone looking to boost their digital footprint. Five stars all the way!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your kind words.

reviews.comment: I recently had my website developed and am thoroughly impressed with the outcome. The design is not only visually appealing but also perfectly aligns with my vision. The developer was professional, attentive to details, and delivered the project smoothly. Highly recommend their services for anyone looking for top-notch website development.

I want to thank Abbas for his outstanding work on creating my website. His professionalism, responsiveness, and attentiveness truly made a difference. He perfectly understood my needs and translated them into a website that is both aesthetic, functional, and perfectly suited to my activity. Although the delivery times were a bit long, the final result was absolutely worth it. The collaboration process was smooth, and he was always available to answer my questions or make adjustments. I highly recommend Abbas to anyone looking for a reliable service provider for a web project. A big thank you for this exemplary experience!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your kind words!

reviews.comment: Working with Abbas was a fantastic experience! They listened to all my ideas and brought them to life even better than I imagined. The site is fast, looks modern, and functions smoothly across all devices.

reviews_snippet.comment: Abbas provided exceptional service in building our website, demonstrating top-notch professionalism and a sharp eye for detail. Working with him was seamless as he was consistently ahead of schedule, communicated proactively, and responded promptly to all our queries. It was truly a 5-star experience!

WOW!!! My best experience on fiverr ever!! I have used fiverr to make multiple websites and this was my best ever experience. Will be a repeat buyer for any website needs as long as I ever have them. Cannot recommend this seller enough.
Incredible work on a complex website build. Really understanding, willing to go above and beyond. I can’t say enough good things about this guy and his team.
Quick, efficient, and very professional, this is my 2nd gig with Abbas and I highly recommend him to anyone looking for website development or customisation.

The seller did a wonderful job for this project. I am impressed by his professionalism and knowledge. I look forward to working with him further and highly recommend him to anyone. Great Overall Experience!
